articles.description: Top seed Aryna Sabalenka moves a step closer to a maiden French Open title with victory over four-time champion Iga Swiatek in a blockbuster semi-final.
articles.title: French Open 2025 results: Aryna Sabalenka beats Iga Swiatek to reach Roland Garros final

articles.description: England manager Sarina Wiegman says it "doesn't feel like a crisis at all" but she "expects noise" around the team going into Euro 2025.
articles.title: England's Euro 2025 build-up 'doesn't feel like crisis' says Lionesses boss Sarina Wiegman

articles.description: Manchester United have delved into the transfer market despite no European football next season. BBC Sport looks at how they can fund their big-money signings.
articles.title: Bryan Mbeumo transfer news: How can Man Utd afford Brentford striker?

articles.description: Liverpool reject approach from Barcelona to speak to forward Luis Diaz.
articles.title: Liverpool tell Barcelona that Luis Diaz is not for sale

articles.description: Find out more about England's squad as they look to win a second successive European Championship
articles.title: England Euro 2025 Squad

articles.description: England selector Luke Wright stops short of backing incumbent number three Ollie Pope after Jacob Bethell was included in the squad for the first Test against India.
articles.title: Jacob Bethell and Ollie Pope: Luke Wright gives no assurances on England number three

articles.description: Ousmane Dembele and Lamine Yamal, the two favourites for the Ballon d'Or, go head to head in Thursday's Nations League semi-final.
articles.title: Lamine Yamal and Ousmane Dembele: Ballon d'Or rivals meet in Spain v France

articles.description: England bowler Brydon Carse says he considered having his toe amputated to overcome his injury problems during the winter.
articles.title: England v West Indies: Brydon Carse considered having toe amputated to solve injury issues

articles.description: Chelsea defender Millie Bright has a minor knee operation a day after the England international made herself unavailable for selection for this summer's European Championships.
articles.title: England defender Millie Bright has knee surgery after ruling herself out of Euros

articles.description: This summer’s Test series between England and India will be played for a new trophy named after legendary pair Sachin Tendulkar and James Anderson.
articles.title: Sachin Tendulkar and James Anderson honoured with England-India trophy
